title: Oben
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, European, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe restaurant above the Central Library with a panoramic view of the city. Its menu offers many vegetarian and vegan choices from starter to dessert. Supports the Austrian animalist initiative "friendly food" aimed to reduce the excessive consumption of meat by proposing vegetarian and vegan dishes. Ideal for a dinner between vegan and non vegan people.
